name: Magnet Gun
description:
A proof of concept for a Magnet Gun mechanic!

Use your brand new Magnet Gun™ to fire either attractive or repulsive beams of magnetism!

Pull metal objects to you! Push them away! Pull yourself towards metallic panels stuck to the walls!

Left click to fire an attraction beam
Right click to fire a repulsion beam

WASD to move, Sprint to run, CTRL to crouch

Press P to reset the room!

Matthew Dadoun also helped and so did Katie Tong lol
